attributes.action: support a scheme, which would offer pensioners a 10% discount on any food purchases made in UK supermarkets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is hoped, that our UK supermarkets will agree to providing pensioners with a 10% discount on any food purchased in their stores. This discount scheme could provide many people with a welcome and timely reduction in monthly food bills.
